languages.text: After gathering allies and preparing to venture into the unknown, the Lord Captain plunged headlong into the darkness that held ancient nightmares... and the answers to all h{mf|is|er} questions.
languages.original_text: Собрав союзников и приготовившись к неизведанному, Лорд-капитан направил{mf|ся|ась} во тьму, таящую древние кошмары... и ответы на все вопросы.

traits.locale_text: After gathering allies and preparing to venture into the unknown, the Lord Captain plunged headlong into the darkness that held ancient nightmares... and the answers to all h{mf|is|er} questions.
After gathering allies and preparing to venture into the unknown, the Lord Captain plunged headlong into the darkness that held ancient nightmares... and the answers to all h{mf|is|er} questions.
After gathering allies and preparing to venture into the unknown, the Lord Captain plunged headlong into the darkness that held ancient nightmares... and the answers to all h{mf|is|er} questions.
After gathering allies and preparing to venture into the unknown, the Lord Captain plunged headlong into the darkness that held ancient nightmares... and the answers to all h{mf|is|er} questions.

languages.text: Собрав союзников и приготовившись к неизведанному, Лорд-капитан направил{mf|ся|ась} во тьму, таящую древние кошмары... и ответы на все вопросы.

Nachdem der Lord Captain Verbündete um sich geschart und sich auf den Vorstoß ins Unbekannte vorbereitet hatte, stürzte {mf|er|sie} sich kopfüber in die Dunkelheit, die mit uralten Albträumen wartete ... und mit Antworten auf alle {mf|seine|ihre} Fragen.
languages.original_text: After gathering allies and preparing to venture into the unknown, the Lord Captain plunged headlong into the darkness that held ancient nightmares... and the answers to all h{mf|is|er} questions.

traits.locale_text: Nachdem der Lord Captain Verbündete um sich geschart und sich auf den Vorstoß ins Unbekannte vorbereitet hatte, stürzte {mf|er|sie} sich kopfüber in die Dunkelheit, die mit uralten Albträumen wartete ... und mit Antworten auf alle {mf|seine|ihre} Fragen.

languages.text: Après avoir réuni ses alliés et s'être {mf|préparé|préparée} à braver l'inconnu, {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine} plongea tête la première dans les ténèbres renfermant une multitude de cauchemars... et les réponses à toutes ses questions.
languages.original_text: After gathering allies and preparing to venture into the unknown, the Lord Captain plunged headlong into the darkness that held ancient nightmares... and the answers to all h{mf|is|er} questions.

traits.locale_text: Après avoir réuni ses alliés et s'être {mf|préparé|préparée} à braver l'inconnu, {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine} plongea tête la première dans les ténèbres renfermant une multitude de cauchemars... et les réponses à toutes ses questions.

languages.text: 领主舰长召集起了盟友，随后大步迈入了未知的黑暗之中。那里藏着古老的噩梦……也有{mf|他|她}所有问题的答案。
languages.original_text: After gathering allies and preparing to venture into the unknown, the Lord Captain plunged headlong into the darkness that held ancient nightmares... and the answers to all h{mf|is|er} questions.

traits.locale_text: 领主舰长召集起了盟友，随后大步迈入了未知的黑暗之中。那里藏着古老的噩梦……也有{mf|他|她}所有问题的答案。

languages.text: Tras reunir a sus aliados y prepararse para un viaje a lo desconocido, {mf|el|la} Lord Capitán se zambulló en una oscuridad que albergaba pesadillas... y la respuesta a sus preguntas.
languages.original_text: After gathering allies and preparing to venture into the unknown, the Lord Captain plunged headlong into the darkness that held ancient nightmares... and the answers to all h{mf|is|er} questions.

traits.locale_text: Tras reunir a sus aliados y prepararse para un viaje a lo desconocido, {mf|el|la} Lord Capitán se zambulló en una oscuridad que albergaba pesadillas... y la respuesta a sus preguntas.

languages.text: 同志を集め、未知の世界に挑む用意を整えると、ロード・キャプテンは太古の悪夢と…己の問い全てに対する答えを抱く闇へと、頭から飛び込んだ。
languages.original_text: After gathering allies and preparing to venture into the unknown, the Lord Captain plunged headlong into the darkness that held ancient nightmares... and the answers to all h{mf|is|er} questions.

traits.locale_text: 同志を集め、未知の世界に挑む用意を整えると、ロード・キャプテンは太古の悪夢と…己の問い全てに対する答えを抱く闇へと、頭から飛び込んだ。

languages.text: Müttefiklerini toplayan ve bilinmeyene doğru yola koyulmaya hazırlanan Lord Kaptan, kadim kâbuslara ev sahipliği yapan ve tüm sorularının cevaplarını barındıran karanlığa daldı.
languages.original_text: After gathering allies and preparing to venture into the unknown, the Lord Captain plunged headlong into the darkness that held ancient nightmares... and the answers to all h{mf|is|er} questions.
